m_szDocTitle: Global Solar To Smash Milestones, Reach 600 GW In 2020 | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Global Solar To Smash Milestones, Reach 600 GW In 2020 June 22nd, 2016 by Joshua S Hill Â  The global solar market is well on its way to breaking through the milestone of 60 GW of new capacity installed in a year during 2016, according to SolarPower Europe. In its Global Market Outlook for Solar Power 2016-2020 , SolarPower Europe lauded the 50.6 GW of new solar capacity which was added worldwide in 2015, while predicting that it would smash through the 60 GW mark in 2016.
